alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:13PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harrison and northeastern Hancock Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 312 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lyman to Shoreline Park. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, St. Martin, D`iberville, Kiln, Lyman, Shoreline Park, Saucier and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 10 and 47. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 2 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
